thread.title: Elizabeth Hurley, 51, Stuns in Teeny Blue Bikini: See the Photo Taken by Her Son Damian
thread.title_full: Elizabeth Hurley, 51, Stuns in Teeny Blue Bikini: See the Photo Taken by Her Son Damian

title: Elizabeth Hurley, 51, Stuns in Teeny Blue Bikini: See the Photo Taken by Her Son Damian

persons.name: megan french elizabeth hurley courtesy elizabeth

text:
Elizabeth Hurley, 51, Stuns in Teeny Blue Bikini: See the Photo Taken by Her Son Damian January 27, 2017 @ 5:10 PM By Megan French Elizabeth Hurley Courtesy Elizabeth Hurley/Instagram 
She’s never looked better! Elizabeth Hurley stunned in a teeny blue bikini in a photo from her beach getaway to India on Thursday, January 26. PHOTOS: Hot Celebs in Swimsuits over 40 
The Royals actress, 51, looked ageless and flaunted her incredible figure in the embroidered swim suit from her eponymous beachwear line. In the photo, Hurley wore her hair in beachy waves and accessorized with a pair of sunglasses with ombré lenses. 
“Life is short, buy the bikini @elizabethhurleybeach #crystalbikini #handembroidered pic by @damianhurley1,” she captioned the Instagram pic. A photo posted by ❌ (@damianhurley1) on Jan 26, 2017 at 10:30am PST 
The Austin Powers star credited her 14-year-old son, Damian , whom she shares with ex Steve Bing , for taking the flawless photo. The teen also posted a beach pic with his mother on his own Instagram, writing, “Think it’s safe to say I’m taller @elizabethhurley1.”
